p: After anesthesia with 5.0% isoflurane in 100% O 2 rats were subjected to a subplantar injection of CAR (0.1 mL/rat of a 1% suspension in saline) with a 27-gauge needle into the right hind paw, as described previously by Morris and Britti [ 40, 41]. The animals were sacrificed after 6 h post CAR-injection by isoflurane overdose. All analyses were performed in a blinded manner of experimental groups [ 42].
